Reference

AMMI

Functions for AMMI analysis

AMMI_indexes()

AMMI-based indexes for stability and simultaneous selection

anova_ind()

Within-environment analysis of variance

autoplot(<WAAS.AMMI>) autoplot(<WAASB>)

Several types of residual plots

plot(<validation.AMMIF>)

Plot the RMSPD of all AMMI-family tested models

plot(<WAASBYratio>) plot(<WAASratio.AMMI>)

Plot heat maps with genotype ranking

predict(<WAAS.AMMI>)

Predict the means of a WAAS.AMMI object

summary(<WAAS.AMMI>)

Summary a WAAS.AMMI object

validation.AMMI()

Cross-validation for estimation of AMMI model

validation.AMMIF()

Cross-validation for estimation of all AMMI-family models

WAAS.AMMI()

Weighted Average of Absolute Scores for AMMI analysis

WAASratio.AMMI()

Weighted Average of Absolute Scores for AMMI analysis in different scenarios of WAAS/GY ratio

BLUP

Functions for BLUP analysis

autoplot(<WAAS.AMMI>) autoplot(<WAASB>)

Several types of residual plots

plot(<blup>)

Plot the BLUPs for genotypes

plot(<eigen>)

Plot the eigenvalues

plot(<scores>)

Plot scores in different graphical interpretations

plot(<WAASBYratio>) plot(<WAASratio.AMMI>)

Plot heat maps with genotype ranking

plot(<WAASBY>)

Plot WAASBY values for genotype ranking

Resende_indexes()

Stability indexes proposed by Resende based on a mixed-effect model

summary(<WAASB>)

Summary a WAASB object

validation.blup()

Cross-validation for blup prediction

WAASB()

Weighted Average of Absolute Scores for the BLUP'S GxE effects matrix generated by a mixed-effect model

WAASBYratio()

Weighted Average of Absolute Scores from SVD of BLUP-interaction effects matrix in different scenarios of WAASB/GY ratio

MTSI

Multi-trait indexes

FAI_BLUP()

Multi-trait index based on factor analysis and ideotype-design

MTSI()

Multi-trait stability index

plot(<FAI_BLUP>)

Multitrait index based on factor analysis and ideotype-design

plot(<MTSI>)

Plot the multi-trait stability index

summary(<MTSI>)

Summary a MTSI object

Biometry

Useful functions for biometric models

as(<group_factors>) is(<group_factors>)

Coerce to an object of class group_factors

colindiag()

Collinearity Diagnostics

corr_ci()

Nonparametric confidence interval for Pearson's correlation coefficient

corr_ss()

Sample size planning for a desired Pearson's correlation cofidence interval.

find_outliers()

Find possible outliers in a dataset

mahala()

Mahalanobis Distance

mahala_design()

Mahalanobis distance using data from a designed experiment

pairs_mantel()

Mantel test for a set of correlation matrices

path_coeff()

Path coefficients with minimal multicollinearity

summary(<path_coeff>)

Summarize an object generated by the function path_coeff()

Helper

Helper functions for METAAB package

as(<group_factors>) is(<group_factors>)

Coerce to an object of class group_factors

bind_val()

Bind cross-validation objects.

comb_vars()

Generate pairwise combinations of variables by applying one function to each pair

ge_stats()

Parametric statistics for genotype-vs-environment interaction

group_factors()

Split a dataframe into subsets grouped by one or more factors

mmat()

Make a two-way table based on categorical and numerical arguments

performs_ammi()

Performs Additive Main effects and Multiplicative Interaction

rbind_fill()

Helper function for combining data.frames by row, filling missing values

resca()

Rescale a continuous vector to have specified minimum and maximum values

theme_waasb

A personalized theme for the WAASB ggplot2-based graphics

Datasets

Data for reproducible examples

data_ge

A replicate-based data of 10 genotypes cultivated in 14 environments

data_ge2

A replicate-based data of 13 maize hybrids cultivated in 4 environments

int.effects

Dataset with genotype-by-environment interaction effects

meansGxE

A dataset with means of 10 genotypes cultivated in 5 environments
